Class: Epoch.Chart.Bar

Defined in: coffee/charts/bar.coffee
Inherits: Epoch.Chart.Plot

Overview

Static bar chart implementation (using d3).

  • # (Function) x()
  • # (Function) x1(x0)
  • # (Function) y()
  • # (Array) _remapData() Remaps the bar chart data into a form that is easier to display.
  • # (void) draw() Draws the bar char.
